title: old woman: medium-dark skin tone

adjectives: Of, relating to, or denoting the sex which is generally characterized as the one associated with the larger gametes (for species which have two sexes and for which this distinction can be made).
Being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces fertilizable gametes (ova) from which offspring develop
Belonging to the sex with larger, fertilizable gametes.

Belonging to the sex which typically produces eggs, which in humans and most other mammals is typically the one which has XX chromosomes; belonging to the sex which has larger gametes (for species which have two sexes and for which this distinction can be made).
Advanced in years; (`aged' is pronounced as two syllables)
Older; higher in rank; longer in length of tenure or service
(used especially of persons) having lived for a relatively long time or attained a specific age
(For a person or an animal) Having lived for a relatively long period of time.
verbs: Begin to seem older; get older
To begin to look older; to get older.
nouns: A woman is a female human.
Female adult human
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female human.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
Adult female human being.
Your own wife
An older person or an older member, usually a leader, of some community.
An old person.
Someone older than someone else (with possessive).
A name suffix used after a child's name when his parent has the same name
The style at the end of a person's name which gives additional identifying information about the person
An older person (usually considered to be above the age of 60).
Person respected and listened to for being old in age or in membership.
A person who is older than you are
A name suffix, in the Western English-language naming tradition, follows a person's full name and provides additional information about the person.
A pet name for one's grandmother.
A mother of someone's parent.
The mother of one of someone's parents.
The name used for one's grandma
The mother of your father or mother
Mother of someone's parent.
A polite name for any woman
A woman who is old
An old woman.
An elderly woman.

description: This version of the  Old Woman emoji has the  Medium-dark Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Dark Brown Skin Tone on supported p
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the old woman emoji with a medium-dark skin tone embodies wisdom and warmth, her face etched with gentle, realistic lines that convey a lifetime of experience.  Her kind eyes and subtle smile, enhanced by Apple's masterful lighting and soft shading, create a comforting presence.  This emoji is frequently used to represent elders, grandmothers, or to express respect and affection.
